chrome.notes: Before version 71, formatToParts() returned an object with an incorrectly cased type key of dayperiod. Version 71 and later use the specification defined dayPeriod. See Chromium bug 865351.

chrome_android.notes: Before version 71, formatToParts() returned an object with an incorrectly cased type key of dayperiod. Version 71 and later use the specification defined dayPeriod. See Chromium bug 865351.

notes: Before version 12.0.0, formatToParts() returned an object with an incorrectly cased type key of dayperiod. Version 12.0.0 and later use the specification defined dayPeriod. See Chromium bug 865351.
Before version 13.0.0, only the locale data for en-US is available by default. See the DateTimeFormat() constructor for more details.

opera.notes: Before version 58, formatToParts() returned an object with an incorrectly cased type key of dayperiod. Version 58 and later use the specification defined dayPeriod. See Chromium bug 865351.

opera_android.notes: Before version 50, formatToParts() returned an object with an incorrectly cased type key of dayperiod. Version 50 and later use the specification defined dayPeriod. See Chromium bug 865351.
